title: Are We Worried About The Rams or Impressed By The Saints? | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 337)
description:
The Rams and Saints gave us what we expected, but which team told us more? (3:30) Plus the Patriots and Belichick have mastered position switching, the Steelers are who we thought they were with or without Le’Veon Bell (36:00), and Nathan Peterman continues to do Nathan Peterman things (49:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
